# Improcode - Pomodoro Focus App

> AI-powered Pomodoro timer for maximum focus and productivity.

## Description
Improcode is a comprehensive Pomodoro Timer web application featuring AI-powered insights, task management, ambient sounds, and detailed analytics for focus enhancement and productivity tracking.

## Website
https://improcode.com

## Features
- Precision Pomodoro Timer with customizable intervals (25/5/15 min default)
- Task Management with session linking
- Performance Analytics and progress tracking
- Ambient Soundscapes for deep work (rain, cafe, fireplace, etc.)
- Consistency Streaks and habit building
- Light/Dark adaptive interface
- AI-powered focus insights (Improcode AI)
- Leaderboard for competitive focus sessions

## Tech Stack
- Next.js 14 (App Router)
- React 18
- TypeScript
- Tailwind CSS
- Supabase (Auth + Database)
- Framer Motion (Animations)

## Pricing
- Free tier: Core timer, 5 active tasks, 7-day history
- Pro tier: Coming soon (unlimited tasks, cloud sync, advanced analytics)

## Pages
- / - Landing page with features overview
- /timer - Main Pomodoro timer interface
- /tasks - Task management
- /progress - Analytics dashboard
- /leaderboard - Global leaderboard
- /settings - User preferences
- /guide - User guide and documentation
- /feedback - Feedback form

## API
- REST API at /api/*
- Authentication via Supabase
- Real-time updates for timer sync

## Contact
- Feedback: https://improcode.com/feedback
- GitHub: https://github.com/dangdinh87
